TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Yayo, title = Yayo, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yayo} }

S.FORM: alang Yayo ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Lang-syo go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 408 buwan, 1,150 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 79% kyan ku 906 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 21% kyan ku 244 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Yami 73%, Amis 3%, Paywan 1%, Puyuma 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Yayo hya' ga Iraraley. tay mkyahu' na Yayo hya' ga Imaorod. tay 'llaw na Yayo hya' ga Iranmeylek. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Yayo ga ungat kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwsan biru seneng maki 1 pqwsan biru seneng. khu skwan biru maki 1 khu khu skwan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Yayo ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Lang-syo go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 408 bowan, 1,150 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 79% kyan ko 906 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 21% kyan ko 244 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Yami 73%, Amis 3%, Paywan 1%, Poyoma 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Yayo hya' ga Iraraley. tay mkyaho' na Yayo hya' ga Imaorod. tay 'llaw na Yayo hya' ga Iranmeylek. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Yayo ga ongat kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwsan biro seneng maki 1 pqwsan biro seneng. kho skwan biro maki 1 kho kho skwan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
